long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Customize your Bluesky experience with new colors, navigation, and layout settings.

🎨 Theme Bluesky with 12 beautiful colors.
📏 Make your feed wider.
✨ Remove clutter and distractions.
👤 Hide unused navigation items.

From the makers of Postpone, the all-in-one social media marketing tool for creators, agencies, and brands. Learn more at www.postpone.app.
